title: Asianconnect
author: Asianconnect
content: Are you ready to win big prizes? Asianconnect has prepared weekly prizes worth FREE BETS just for you. For inquiries, please contact us via email at sales@asianconnect88.com  Other than that, you may visit us our website at https://www.asianconnect88.com/.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Please provide necessary link on your thread like official website and social media links. Does the casino doesn’t have any live support that you need to be contacted via email for inquiry? And are you an official representative    of this casino? Please update your original thread with all the details of the casino so that it will save time for all of us to answer and ask question here that can be eliminated if you provide already details about the casino. I will give a feedback soon about the casino as soon as you provide official link just to make sure I’m visiting the correct website. Welcome to the forum btw!

comments.author: Asianconnect
comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on October 06, 2022, 03:03:07 PMPlease provide necessary link on your thread like official website and social media links. Does the casino doesn’t have any live support that you need to be contacted via email for inquiry? And are you an official representative    of this casino? Please update your original thread with all the details of the casino so that it will save time for all of us to answer and ask question here that can be eliminated if you provide already details about the casino. I will give a feedback soon about the casino as soon as you provide official link just to make sure I’m visiting the correct website. Welcome to the forum btw!Hi, Coin_trader! Thanks for welcoming us here, and I appreciate your advice regarding the post. Yes, I'm an official marketing representative of Asianconnect and we are introducing our newest promotion to anyone interested to earn. The correct email address has already been posted, so if you're interested to join, you may email our Sales team for further discussion.

comments.author: samuraijin
comments.body: the link above cannot be accessed even though I am interested in trying it, did you put the site link wrong, hope you update the link above if there is a writing error so that I can test the free bet on your gambling site

comments.body: Quote from: samuraijin on October 06, 2022, 03:46:00 PMthe link above cannot be accessed even though I am interested in trying it, did you put the site link wrong, hope you update the link above if there is a writing error so that I can test the free bet on your gambling siteHi, samuraijin. comments.author: Renampun
comments.body: looks like your account has been around since 2014 but you just created an ANN thread for your gambling site here, why is it taking so long LOL.I had plans to register and try to play but when I see the TOS, do you require KYC for users when making withdrawals and how long does it take for WD or deposit to process?Quote from: samuraijin on October 06, 2022, 03:46:00 PMthe link above cannot be accessed even though I am interested in trying it, did you put the site link wrong, hope you update the link above if there is a writing error so that I can test the free bet on your gambling sitelooks like your country has banned this site, you should use a VPN or change your DNS.

comments.author: Asianconnect
comments.body: Quote from: Renampun on October 06, 2022, 04:56:45 PMlooks like your account has been around since 2014 but you just created an ANN thread for your gambling site here, why is it taking so long LOL.I had plans to register and try to play but when I see the TOS, do you require KYC for users when making withdrawals and how long does it take for WD or deposit to process?Yes, you need to go through KYC first before making a withdrawal. The processing time differs per payment gateway. Instant processing for our e-wallets, 3 confirmations with BTC, and 10 minutes for USDT. You may check here for more details: https://www.asianconnect88.com/payments/

comments.author: ralle14
comments.body: Quote from: Renampun on October 06, 2022, 04:56:45 PMlooks like your account has been around since 2014 but you just created an ANN thread for your gambling site here, why is it taking so long LOL.That's because they already do have an ANN thread and OP is probably unaware or lost track of it. Currently, there are two other ANN threads that are related to Asianconnect. The first thread is similar to this thread and then there's also the second one that was made by another account and i'm guessing they don't have access to that account anymore.For the OP I suggest locking one of the two threads (guide for locking a thread) that you started since the gambling section only has one thread per site rule.

comments.author: Asianconnect
comments.body: Quote from: ralle14 on October 06, 2022, 05:23:09 PMQuote from: Renampun on October 06, 2022, 04:56:45 PMlooks like your account has been around since 2014 but you just created an ANN thread for your gambling site here, why is it taking so long LOL.That's because they already do have an ANN thread and OP is probably unaware or lost track of it. Currently, there are two other ANN threads that are related to Asianconnect. The first thread is similar to this thread and then there's also the second one that was made by another account and i'm guessing they don't have access to that account anymore.For the OP I suggest locking one of the two threads (guide for locking a thread) that you started since the gambling section only has one thread per site rule.Locking this thread, and reposting on our original thread. Thanks, ralle14!
